title: You will have to handover the amenity space to the Authority before approval of final layout as per Regulation No
clause_text: You will have to handover the amenity space to the Authority before approval of final layout as per Regulation No.3.5. (applicable in case where owner is not allowed to develop) This permission does not entitle you to develop the land which does not vest in you. ** Name of the Municipal Corporation / Council / Nagar Panchayat / Collector shall be mentioned. With reference to your application No. , dated for the
section: Duties and Responsibilities of Geotechnical Engineer :
